A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was a disaster.  I've tried to like it but I just can't.  I can't even make it half way though now that it's on DVD. There is just so much wrong with it.  It's not the things that they've done  to the characters\, but so much of the plot just doesn't make any sense.  Add to that the story has no depth.  I'm just hoping that solo will turn out to be a far better addition to the franchise.
